page.title: 14Crofting in Uyeasound.
page.content: There are several crofts in Uyeasound as well as a couple of farms. We spoke to a man who had been working a croft for 15 years which was previously worked by his father.He has 230 acres of land and his house is on the croft.He said he enjoyed crofting. He grows 100 tons of silage,6 acres of hay,more than 3 acres of barley and half an acre of potatoes.He has machinery but no workers to help him. He keeps 10 breeding cows,8 young cattle and 6 calves.He also has 150 breeding ewes and a pony. Besides working his croft,this man is also a part-time Insurance Agent and a part-time Lighthouse Keeper.
